text: It is most unfair to call Malachias: " a cut-rate " Dolce Vita; 95 for it is far more intimate and deeply felt. In 1944 Herbert Selpin tried a similar feat in "Titanic" by paralleling the last of the Third Reich with the sinking of the great ocean liner; and paid for his audacity with his life.
